rewrite1: In the tenth paragraph, adjust the left indent to a negative offset of one character, switch the font to Calibri, and alter the line spacing to double.
rewrite2: In the tenth paragraph, adjust the left indent by moving it one character to the left, switch the font to Calibri, and set the line spacing to double.
rewrite3: In the tenth paragraph, adjust the left indent to a negative one character value, switch the font to Calibri, and alter the line spacing to double.
